error.message: Parameter $query_factory of method Drupal\bat_api\Plugin\ServiceDefinition\CalendarEventsIndex::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.

Call to deprecated function db_select(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call select() on it. For example,

Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated function entity_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity type storage's load() method.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to bat_api.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
